name: Bubba Hero Stainless Steel Travel Mug - Black Licorice, 18 fl oz
description: Durable stainless steel mug with vacuum insulation to keep beverages hot or cold for hours. Ideal for commuters and adventurers.

name: Contigo Byron 2.0 Stainless Steel Travel Mug with SNAPSEAL
description: Features SNAPSEAL lid and THERMALOCK insulation, keeping drinks hot for 7 hours or cold for 18. Spill-proof and ergonomic design.

name: Contigo Snack Hero 2-in-1 Bottle Set - Blue
description: Dual-compartment kids' bottle: 13 oz water bottle and 4 oz snack container. Leak-proof, BPA-free, easy-carry handle.

name: Klean Kanteen Kid Classic 12oz Stainless Steel Bottle
description: Eco-friendly stainless steel kids bottle with spill-proof sport cap. Designed for small hands and active lifestyles.

name: Pink Thermo Flask
description: Chic and compact vacuum-insulated pink flask that keeps your drinks at the perfect temperature all day.

name: Corkcicle Canteen Classic Collection - Triple Insulated
description: Stylish and rugged triple-insulated canteen keeps drinks cold for 25 hours or hot for 12. Shatterproof stainless steel.

name: Simple Modern Thermo Flask
description: Minimalist design with double-wall insulation. Keeps beverages cold for 24 hours or hot for 12.

name: Red Thermo Bottle
description: Sleek red stainless steel thermal bottle perfect for keeping drinks at just the right temperature on the go.

name: SM Thermo Bottle
description: Durable and spill-resistant bottle designed for outdoor use and gym workouts. Insulated to retain heat and cold.

name: Orca Insulated Thermo Bottle
description: Tough and reliable bottle with premium insulation for outdoor use. Keeps drinks fresh all day.

name: Copper Vacuum Insulated Bottle, 750ml
description: High-capacity, vacuum-insulated copper bottle. Maintains drink temperature with leak-proof performance.

name: Contigo SNAPSEAL Thermo Bottle
description: SNAPSEAL lid for easy, one-handed operation. THERMALOCK insulation keeps drinks hot or cold for hours.

name: TAL Ranger Thermo Bottle - Navy Blue
description: Rugged and large-capacity bottle with double-wall insulation. Perfect for hiking and long trips.

name: Starbucks Lime Green Stainless Steel Tumbler - 12oz
description: Trendy two-tone tumbler from Starbucks. Stainless steel body with secure lid, perfect for on-the-go coffee.

name: Contigo Thermalock Vacuum Insulation Bottle
description: Reliable thermal bottle with vacuum insulation and leak-proof design for everyday travel.

name: Hot and Cold Thermo Cup
description: Versatile thermo cup suitable for both hot and cold beverages. Compact and spill-proof.

name: Hydrapeak Sport Water Bottle with Straw Lid
description: Double-wall insulated sport bottle with a straw lid. Designed for athletes and gym-goers.

name: Tylt Bottle 2.0 - Power Bank + Wireless Charger
description: Revolutionary 3-in-1 bottle with built-in power bank and wireless charging capability. Hydration meets innovation.

name: Stanley 16oz Stainless Steel Insulated Pint
description: Iconic Stanley pint glass with bottle opener. Double-wall insulation perfect for cold beers on the go.
